hero.title: Sustainable Cashew Farming
hero.subtitle: Cultivating quality while preserving our planet

intro.title: The Importance of Sustainable Cashew Agribusiness
content: The global cashew industry plays a vital role in many economies, particularly in West Africa where Ivory Coast leads production.
As demand grows, so does the need for sustainable practices that protect ecosystems while ensuring farmer livelihoods.
At AfriNuts Export, we're committed to revolutionizing cashew production through environmentally and socially responsible methods.

items.title: Deforestation & Biodiversity
items.content: Cashew expansion can lead to forest clearing, threatening ecosystems.

items.title: Water & Soil Quality
items.content: Intensive farming risks water depletion and soil degradation.

items.title: Chemical Use
items.content: Pesticides and fertilizers can harm environments if misused.

items.title: Waste Management
items.content: Processing generates shells and apples needing proper disposal.

items.title: Agroforestry Systems
items.content: We intercrop cashews with native species to maintain biodiversity.

items.title: Water Conservation
items.content: Drip irrigation and rainwater harvesting minimize water use.

items.title: Organic Methods
items.content: Natural pest control and compost replace synthetic inputs.

items.title: Waste Valorization
items.content: Shells become biofuel; apples are used for juices and vinegar.

farmers.title: Empowering Smallholder Farmers
content: We provide fair pricing, training, and market access to local growers.
Our direct relationships eliminate middlemen, ensuring better incomes.

labor.title: Ethical Labor Practices
content: Safe working conditions and fair wages for all employees.
No child labor and strict adherence to international standards.

gender.title: Gender Equity
content: Special programs to support women in cashew production.
Equal pay and leadership opportunities across operations.

future.title: Our Vision for Sustainable Growth
content: By 2031, we aim to be carbon-neutral across our supply chain.
Our processing center will implement zero-waste principles.
We're investing in renewable energy and blockchain traceability.
